description:
If DIY is your kind of language, this kit will help you replace the cables on bikes with SRAM and Shimano cable-actuated brakes.

  • Double-ended cables work with both road and mountain brakes
  • Galvanized, coiled, non-lubed cables are low friction for smooth reliable performance
  • Includes everything needed for a complete brake cable and housing replacement for most rim brakes. 1 x 2500mm CEX brake housing, 1 x 1350mm front brake inner cable, 1 x 2350mm rear brake inner cable. 6 x open brass end caps, and 2 x cable tips
name: Jagwire Brake Cable and Housing Set DIY Kit
